climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: 【17.3" diagonal, FHD (1920 x 1080)】Enjoy your favorite content in 1080p for crystal-clear visuals and vibrant image quality. Beyond pixel count, your display lets you see more from anywhere thanks to the micro-edge bezel and anti-glare screen.

【11th Gen Intel Core i5-1155G7 Processor】No matter what your daily schedule looks like, the 11th Generation Intel Core processor brings the perfect combination of features to make you unstoppable. Get things done fast with high performance, instant responsiveness and best-in- class connectivity.

【16GB DDR4 RAM】Plenty of high-bandwidth RAM to smoothly run your games as well as multiple programs. 【1TB PCIe SSD】Save files fast and store more data. With massive amounts of storage and advanced communication power, great for major gaming, multiple servers, backups, and more.

【Full-Size Keyboard】with numeric pad, Allows you to enjoy comfortable and accurate typing.【Intel Iris Xe Graphics】with shared video memory provide solid image quality for Internet use, movies, basic photo editing and casual gaming.

【 Windows 11 Home included】 3-cell, 41 Wh Lithium-ion prismatic Battery, 15.78 x 10.15 x 0.78 in, 5.25 lb. Ports:1 USB Type-C 5Gbps signaling rate; 2 USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate; 1 headphone/microphone combo; 1 AC smart pin; 1 HDMI 1.4b,. Wireless-AC + Bluetooth, HP True Vision 720p HD camera, Silver.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice. Bought a cordless mouse and a case for this sweet sweet unit. There is a lot of junk Macrosroft included in it's spyware festival and programming brainwash so I deleted most of it. It seems Windows 11 is designed to RUN THE USER and it takes control and makes the user do extra work. I am in love with W7 and this W11 has screwed with just about EVEYTHING good about W7 and turned the OS into a freeking nightmare. I hate W11 and W10 but the 'system' is set up to screw us for their profit.That said, it is fast and efficient and so it should be given it's guts and components. I can do without the cyber rhetoric and excelsior the Macroshroft stuffed in there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great laptop for a great price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: ok, let me first say I was very skeptical about getting a 'refurbished' laptop. I'm not very trusting of people OR rebuilt electronics. HOWEVER, I have to say it came extremely well packaged, it arrived early and I was able to set it up with no problems. Keep in mind though that the first time of booting up a new OS, it does take a bit longer than normal but don't lose hope, this one did just fine.It looks like a new one with no visible marks or scars or scuffed places.I thought I ordered a "touch screen" so I find myself touching the screen now and then, only to remember this one is NOT a touch screen. Which is no big deal, just comical for me.I do recommend this seller. If this one takes a turn for the worse, I'll update my review. But I think it's going to be a keeper.update.I had to contact Customer Support over an issue (totally my fault) and they were quick to respond, gracious and VERY helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love my new laptop
reviews.reviewText: I know it’s refurbished but it arrived looking like a beautiful brand new laptop. At first it was slow. I was thinking it’s so pretty, got to get used to it being slow. After all not brand new. But after spending a lot of time updating windows. It came to great speed. Lightweight. Doesn’t have overheating problem. Great screen, contrast, brightness. Love it.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Freezing & Lagging Right Out Of the Box! RETROGRADE MADNESS?
reviews.reviewText: I hate leaving bad reviews for anyone, but I guess this was a bit of bad luck for me. Usually I strike gold with Amazon renewed products, but this was was a dud. I opened the box, in which the laptop was shipped just in the normal laptop box and not inside of another protective box. I selected English and waited for Windows to start. I got to the part where it asks for an email, I entered it and the laptop froze. I kept clicking and nothing. It finally unfreezes, allowing me to re-enter the email and click Next. NOPE! It froze again! When it finally unfroze another time, I was able to sign in.After the laptop finishes and windows completes, I click on McAfee and it takes forever to load. So I give up on that and try to open Edge to download Chrome and it also freezes and then goes into the “Not responding screen” and stays frozen until it closes. I ran the McAfee to make sure it wasn’t a virus on it or anything (I just opened the box right?). After it kept freezing I gave up and the boxed it and ran to the UPS Store to return this. It wouldn’t even allow me to remove or access the email account because it kept freezing.Maybe I will wait until this Retrograde is over around Jan 13th 2023 to try another laptop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This laptop is exactly as described in the description. I would definitely purchase from this seller again.
